page.title: 05Transport
page.content: When we went around interviewing people and we found out that most people have transport in the village.The older people don't have transport so some of them use public transport.We asked what public transport they had if they used bus or taxi.In our sample all but one had a car.Three older people used the bus.Adults went shopping,to work,to market,on outings and visiting people.We also found out that people that have cars and other transport of their own don't think that public transport is economical.But older people that don't have transport think it is economical.I found out that the people that have a car or any other transport use it for mostly shopping.Our conclusion is that children have bikes.Adults 20 to 65 have cars and bikes etc.
